author: Ben Brown
title: Dow Extends Meteoric Rally as Pressure to Reopen New York Spirals
description: With coronavirus cases beginning to plateau in New York, can the city begin to reopen? The post Dow Extends Meteoric Rally as Pressure to Reopen New York Spirals appeared first on CCN.com
content:
• The Dow Jones Industrial Average (DJIA) extended its meteoric recovery today as the U.S. stock market enjoyed a blistering rally.
